name: Certificate of Undergraduate Study in Esports Business

Certificate of Undergraduate Study in Es: Certificate of Undergraduate Study in Esports Business The Certificate in Undergraduate Studies (CUGS) in Esports Business will provide students with the strategic guidance and leadership skills to move competitive electronic gaming teams through different leagues and generate revenue to grow. The program is comprised of a core curriculum of strategic growth, organizational leadership and financial management all within the field of organized Esports. Students who earn this certificate will be prepared to move forward within their current industry or transition to administrative Esports by demonstrating in-depth analytical competencies, leadership skills, and the communication of thoughtful solutions.
